title: Is it possible to repair our Ozone? - Quora

response.answer_text: Assuming you mean the ozone layer it is very gradually repairing itself and has been since the Montreal Protocol 30 years ago, banned ozone-depleting substances, mostly CFCs. Don’t hold your breath though, it will be decades before it has fully recovered. NASA Data Aids Ozone Hole’s Journey to Recovery

The ozone layer in the stratosphere doesn’t need repairing. Ozone forms from the CO2 in the stratosphere in response to UV radiation. With the current low sunspot numbers there is less UV reaching that and to warm the stratosphere.
